mapper.insert: insert into s_board (STUDY_NO, LIST_NAME, B_NO, B_WRITE_DAY, B_WRITER, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_HIT) values (20, '게시판', 4, sysdate, 'cj', ${b_title}, ${b_content}, 3);
mapper.select: select STUDY_NO as study_no, LIST_NAME as list_name, B_NO as b_no, B_WRITE_DAY as b_wirte_day, B_WRITER as b_writer, B_TITLE as b_title, B_CONTENT as b_content, B_HIT as g_hit from s_board;
